page.title: 03 BRERETON MAN'S DAY.
page.content: My dad is an Area Manager for Stanton's Bakery. He gets up between seven and eight in the morning. He has to be at work before half past eight. He usually has Thursday and Sunday off but can change a day off to Wednesday. His job is to go around all the shops which are in his area. This used to be around Rugeley, Stafford and Lichfield but now he's going up North. He travels in an Escort Popular car and drives about 90-100 miles a day. He makes sure everything is alright in the shops. He finishes up at the bakery to check the takings. When he buys petrol or pays to go on a carpark he gets his money back from Stantons if he keeps his ticket. He often works until about 7.30pm.
